reviews.review: Super fun and entertaining! Its honestly really hard to get bored of the game too!
good game for fun with friends highly recommend it :}
Для того, чтобы насладиться игрой и от 1-го и от 3-го лица самое то. Игра создана, чтобы сердце забивалось сильнее
this game is so bad the queue times take so long and you get banned for no reason
tek başına oynayıncada eğlenceli arkla oynayınca yerinde duramıyon amk güzel oyun şu an main oyunum
Been playing on and off for years. Always wonderful for a good scare and adrenaline rush

Honestly, I recommend the game. I mean yeah, the killer is OP and yeah you will rage quit and yeah it is unfair and yeah is pay to win and yeah every map is homo and yeah YOU WILL RAGE QUIT AGAIN. But good game

Excelente juego para Multijugador e individual, las diferentes formas de jugar con el sistema de Perks y leveleo lo hacen bastante fresco y disfrutable, aunque estaría mil veces mejor si el matchmaking y el emparejamiento estuviesen mas optimos.
Los personajes nuevos, mapas, skins y nuevas habilidades son su joya pero estaría bien que agregaran un par de eventos u otro tipo de minijuegos
It can be super fun. The community is active and there's just something about getting revenge on your friends lol.

played killer got looped by a 5000 hour survivor

I just think its a great and addicting game
Great game with tons of replay-ability.
this game me reinstall it after its update
Fun game to play with friends and other ppl. Fun too for challenging self to learn new thing to win. Many nostalgic characters making this more fun. :D

Spooky hide n seek. Fun to play with friends, sometimes fun without depends on the people you get paired with Definitely some toxicity in the community as with most games.
Playing killer is hit n miss when you're low rank. Sometimes you get paired with red ranks and it's extremely difficult to do anything. Definitely need to practice to be good at killer or you'll just straight up get bullied.
Buggy, but still fun.
Pretty good, but the devs are eating their own shit at times

fun game play and playing with friends just makes it better.
不对称性注定了会有人得到相对极其不公正的游戏体验，新手屠夫打针对新手人类不敢救人不敢修机很大程度上劝退了许多玩家，也造成车队欺负屠夫，屠夫变态针对，二者之间愈演愈烈，在初期游戏加入ai角色都比让新手来的强

Sehr spannendes und durch die vielen verschiedenen Perks unterschidliches Spiel in allen Partien. Das Spielen als Survivor sowie als Killer macht sehr viel Spaß und mit drei Freunden zusammen zu überleben ist super cool.

I've been pushing off playing this game for years. Big mistake, I finally started playing it and nearly can't stop. It is so much fun and has become me and my friends go-to game for a good time!
